choose_plan: Choose a plan that matches your investment philosophy
plan_description_flex: This plan allows investors to withdraw earned assets at any time with zero delay and restrictions. It's designed for easy access with low risk, perfect for first-time users.
plan_description_fixed: This plan offers stronger and more stable returns, allowing users to withdraw earned assets on the last day of each week. It's designed for weekly payouts and long-term growth.
when_earnings: When Will I Receive My Earnings?
exchange_transmission: The exchange transmission begins upon initial stake acquisition.
interest_distributed: Interest will be distributed to your account according to the plan timeline.
interest_credited: interest will be credited to your account on
consistent_payouts: consistent, scheduled payouts on the last day of each week
free_airdrop: If you continue to grow your asset, you will receive free weekly airdrop rewards.
when_withdraw: When Can I Withdraw My Assets?
withdraw_2_hours: After allocating to the Wealth Management plan of your choice, you can initiate a withdrawal request 2 hours before the settlement period.
withdraw_2_days: After allocating to the Wealth Management plan of your choice, you can initiate a withdrawal request 2 days before the settlement period.
withdrawal_note: ‚ö†Ô∏è Important Note: Withdrawal requests are not allowed on the day of settlement and the day before.
manage_funds: Please manage your funds accordingly if necessary.
vat_p2: We are obliged to collect 7.5% VAT for the European Commission.
vat_p3: VAT applies to certain banking services.
